channel.title: Black boy fly
channel.description:
Hello! I haven't been on Mopar in a while, so why not post a cheeky thread. I won't be releasing any information regarding the server apart from updates and content, until further notice. This thread will done up nicely soon, I pwomise.
[size=14pt][b]Server content[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Implemented fully working Summoning alongside tool tips.[/li] [li]Server is now all event-driven.[/li] [li]Fully working Galkon's clan chat.[/li] [li]Packets have been re-written.[/li] [li]Player updating has been re-written and is capable of holding over 255 players in a region.[/li] [li]There is no need for multi-threading so got rid of it.[/li] [li]Castle wars is 80% implemented.[/li] [li]Shutdown hook implemented. [/li] [li]Fishing trawlier is 95% implemented.[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]Client content[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Cache packed 602 animations and gfxs.[/li] [li]Cache packed 377 maps, still keeping some 474 maps.[/li] [li]Cache packed 602 NPC's with 474 NPC's.[/li] [li]Cache packed 474 items with some 602 items.[/li] [li]Cache packed new gameframe.[/li] [li]A new toggle system has been added.[/li] [li]Implemented fully working 614 X10 hits alongside new HP bar.[/li] [li]Right click map area now working.[/li] [li]XP Counter implemented with correct formatting.[/li] [li]Tool tips from server to client fully working.[/li] [li]Switching is a lot smoother.[/li] [li]Fully working orbs that update correctly.[/li][/ul]
Client from the start - thanks to Pegasus/Senpai for this picture. [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s24.postimg.org/vhixqs5l1/jerba.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s12.postimg.org/vm1nqh10t/picture.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s28.postimg.org/xevbi0pt9/hitmarks3.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s29.postimg.org/tixilofqv/hurr.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Black boy fly
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Im all for the fun of the server. If the server is all snippets yet it makes the server fun, idgaf if you’re a leecher or not.

Haven’t seen ya in a while entity, Gl.

Read full topic

item.title: Black boy fly
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

just ignore people who are being pricks towards you, we were all at that stage at one point or another so I really don’t see what the big deal is

X Entinity X:

[ul][li]There is no need for multi-threading so got rid of it.[/li][/ul]

Where exactly was concurrency being used? afaik as long as you have more than one core doing certain things (like player updating) in parallel can improve performance by a lot.

X Entinity X:

[ul][li]Shutdown hook implemented. [/li][/ul]

Shutdown hooks are kinda useless because iirc it isn’t even guaranteed that they’ll be fired if the application crashes. Doesn’t hurt to have one though

Read full topic

item.title: Black boy fly
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:14, topic:540584”]I don’t understand why everyone’s being pricks to you, Entity. I don’t really care if there have been tutorials released to content that’s currently in your server, whether you used them or not means nothing to me. Hence why it’s in the development section. Nonetheless, good luck with your development.[/quote]This.

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Black boy fly
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:10, topic:540584”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=659445.msg4410127#msg4410127 date=1393322929]
Hahaha, this is why it’s in development and not advertisement. I’m pretty sure 85% of all the servers in development are all snippets.

Find me snippets for these:

Implemented fully working Summoning alongside tool tips. Server is now all event-driven. Fully working Galkon's clan chat. Packets have been re-written. Player updating has been re-written and is capable of holding over 255 players in a region. There is no need for multi-threading so got rid of it. Garbage collector and shutdown hook implemented.

[/quote]Garbage collector implemented implies that you have no clue what you’re doing.

Have a nice day.[/quote]

send request of garbage collection to JVM*

Clawz fury:

good luck man, haven’t seen you on here in ages

yeah i know, you seem to be doing well.

Read full topic

item.title: Black boy fly
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

Hello! I haven’t been on Mopar in a while, so why not post a cheeky thread. I won’t be releasing any information regarding the server apart from updates and content, until further notice. This thread will done up nicely soon, I pwomise.

[size=14pt]Server content[/size]

[ul][li]Implemented fully working Summoning alongside tool tips.[/li]
[li]Server is now all event-driven.[/li]
[li]Fully working Galkon’s clan chat.[/li]
[li]Packets have been re-written.[/li]
[li]Player updating has been re-written and is capable of holding over 255 players in a region.[/li]
[li]There is no need for multi-threading so got rid of it.[/li]
[li]Castle wars is 80% implemented.[/li]
[li]Shutdown hook implemented. [/li]
[li]Fishing trawlier is 95% implemented.[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]Client content[/size]

[ul][li]Cache packed 602 animations and gfxs.[/li]
[li]Cache packed 377 maps, still keeping some 474 maps.[/li]
[li]Cache packed 602 NPC’s with 474 NPC’s.[/li]
[li]Cache packed 474 items with some 602 items.[/li]
[li]Cache packed new gameframe.[/li]
[li]A new toggle system has been added.[/li]
[li]Implemented fully working 614 X10 hits alongside new HP bar.[/li]
[li]Right click map area now working.[/li]
[li]XP Counter implemented with correct formatting.[/li]
[li]Tool tips from server to client fully working.[/li]
[li]Switching is a lot smoother.[/li]
[li]Fully working orbs that update correctly.[/li][/ul]

Client from the start - thanks to Pegasus/Senpai for this picture.



Read full topic
